casebody.data:
State
v.
Shameil Dontel Smith 269P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016

Mr. Shameil Dontel Smith, Pro Se.

Mr. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. William R. West, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of July 2016 by Defendant for Adversary Preliminary Hearing:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
